Description.Title: PtSoil (Energy-limited soil evaporation)
Description.Authors: Peter D. Jamieson; Glen S. Francis; Derick R. Wilson; Robert J. Martin
Description.Institution: New Zealand Institute for Crop and Food Research Ltd.
Description.ExtendedDescription: Implements the energy-limited stage of soil evaporation using a Priestley–Taylor-based formulation modulated by plant cover. Given evapoTranspirationPriestlyTaylor (ET_PT) and parameters Alpha (Priestley–Taylor coefficient), tau (plant cover factor), and tauAlpha (threshold fraction of net radiation at the soil surface when AlphaE = 1), the effective coefficient AlphaE is: if tau < tauAlpha, AlphaE = 1; else AlphaE = Alpha - ((Alpha - 1) * (1 - tau) / (1 - tauAlpha)). The energy-limited soil evaporation is then computed as energyLimitedEvaporation = (ET_PT / Alpha) * AlphaE * tau.
Description.ShortDescription: Evaporation from the soil in the energy-limited stage.

Input.name: tauAlpha
Input.description: Fraction of the total net radiation exchanged at the soil surface when AlphaE = 1
